0.name: Junior Circle Responsible Owners of Motorcycle
0.description: To assist and guide students to be responsible owners of Motorcycles in obeying and observing traffic rules and regulations prescribe by the Land Transportation Office (LTO).

1.name: Yoga Science Club
1.description: Promote the Science of Yoga, the yoga lifestyle and instill health, inner peace, satisfaction and well-being of mind, body, and spirit into the lives of all individuals.
